Property Detail

accept

java.lang.String accept
Accept header.

basicAuthPassword

java.lang.String basicAuthPassword
basic auth password

basicAuthUserName

java.lang.String basicAuthUserName
basic auth user name

binaryResponse

java.lang.Boolean binaryResponse
Whether the caller expects a binary return. If true, the returned object will be a byte array. Note that this is a workaround to jersey not providing automatic content conversion based on mime type.

body

java.lang.Object body
Body of the request - only useful on POST or PUT.

chunkSize

java.lang.Integer chunkSize
Size (in bytes) to chunk the request.

connectionTimeout

java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout
The Connection Timeout for the Client.

contentType

java.lang.String contentType
Content-Type header.

convertJson

java.lang.Boolean convertJson
Whether to attempt to slurp JSON automatically.

convertXML

java.lang.Boolean convertXML
Attempt to use XmlSlurper to parse xml.

cookies

java.util.Map cookies
Cookies to include with the request.

debug

java.lang.Boolean debug
Whether to log the request and response.

encodeGzip

java.lang.Boolean encodeGzip
Encode the request with gzip compression.

followRedirects

java.lang.Boolean followRedirects
Whether to automatically follow redirects.

form

java.util.Map form
Form parameters Note that if this is set, this is used and body is ignored.

grailsApplication

org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication grailsApplication
Grails application bean.

Headers

ignoreInvalidSSL

java.lang.Boolean ignoreInvalidSSL
Whether to ignore SSL cert validation.

java.util.Map query
Query parameters.

rawClientResponse

java.lang.Boolean rawClientResponse
If true, do not response handling, and return the raw response object.

readTimeout

java.lang.Integer readTimeout
The Read Timeout for the Client.

skipStatusCheck

java.lang.Boolean skipStatusCheck
If true, do not check the response status code, and thus don't throw an exception for codes > 2xx.

uri

java.lang.Object uri
The URI to hit. Can either be a String or an URI.

useBasicAuth

java.lang.Boolean useBasicAuth
If true uses BasicAuth

getGrailsApplication

protected org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication getGrailsApplication()
Returns the grails application bean. This method provides a convenience so that users are not responsible for injecting the Grails application bean themselves. This also does allow the Grails application bean to be injected for testing.

void validate()
